name: Glad Valakas: Cyberban
description:
Glad Valakas: a game in a shooter genre with RPG elements and nonlinear plot.

The shooter has a lot of content and fanservice in it. You’ll find a lot of ways of fighting your enemies.
You can conquer an internet space and prove your right on domination in internet-space. Glads is power!

You must conquer 5 worlds in the internet space! Explore different worlds for providing your unlimited power. Develop your skills to beat your enemies and then destroy them!

- fight against different hostiles and bosses

- unforgettable thematic levels and original style

- fascinating graphic and amazing soundtrack
